sentences.en: Gawk at it in the town gazebo.
sentences.cn: 在城镇的凉亭里呆呆的看着它。

sentences.en: Behind them the summerhouse and gazebo were already ablaze.
sentences.cn: 在他们身后，凉亭已经闪起了火光。

sentences.en: The preacher was standing inside the gazebo adorned with beautiful pink and white flowers.
sentences.cn: 牧师站在凉亭里面，凉亭用美丽的粉红色和白色的花朵装饰。
